description: Azure operator Nexus is a carrier grade hybrid cloud platform built for mission critical mobile network applications. It simplifies the provisioning of new network services and optimizes the deployment of network functions and applications into on premise data centers.This table collects the kubernetes container & vmorchestration logs of the clusters.

tables.name: NCCKubernetesLogs
tables.description: Containerized application logs from Nexus clusters to gain insight onto the container orchestration platform.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: Node
columns.description: Node name of the Nexus cluster which is generating the log.

columns.name: ContainerName
columns.description: Name of the container generating the log for the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: PodName
columns.description: Pod name generating the log in the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: NamespaceName
columns.description: Namespace where the pod is running in the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: Message generated by the kubernetes containers running on Nexus cluster.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity of the log record. E.g. Info, Warning, Critical, Error, Notice, Debug.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterManagerName
columns.description: Name of the ClusterManager managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the On-prem Nexus cluster.
